screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .tanks file in Apple TextEdit
screenshot.caption: TANKS file open in Apple TextEdit

description: In Tanks: The Crusades, players pilot 2D tanks around maze-like battlefields and shoot at enemies. The game is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.

Tanks: The Crusades loads a variety of game data from TANKS files. The game's default TANKS files include data used to load items and crusades (campaigns). (You can find these files in the game's crusades and items directories.) Players can also create TANKS files that store custom level, crusade, and tank data.
